resources.string: This Daydream (ScreenSaver) will prevent and alleviate the burn-in of AMOLED screen on many Samsung and Motorola phones. Click the button below to setup the daydream in the Android\'s Settings. Select the \"Burn-in Dream\" and set the \"When to daydream\" in the menu to \"Either\" to activate the daydream when the phone is on the charger.
Set the max daydream time in seconds
